txt.en: The crumbled remains of this seal offer little knowledge to whom it might have belonged. Perhaps if you took rubbings of several of the seals around Tham Varan and brought them to the Rangers, they might be able to identify them.
'Those lines you read to me indicate Tham Varan was owned by a family from the south, likely Gondor. This is very interesting indeed.'
'I wonder who the lords and ladies of Tham Varan once were....'
The identity of those who once resided within Tham Varan has been lost to history. Perhaps the ruins still hold the answer.
Most of the seal has been destroyed, but a few lines are still legible
Tham Varan is east of Tinnudir and beyond Tham Nambarth.\n\nGúrhebnir asked you to venture to Tham Varan and inspect several crumbling seals to determine the history of the ruins.
The Rangers are at Tinnudir, west of Tham Varan and Tham Nambarth.\n\nOne of the Rangers will be interested to learn of the few lines you were able to read.
